broilerFeed.name: Prestige Broiler Pre-Starter
broilerFeed.description: Specially formulated feed for young broiler chicks in the pre-starter phase.
broilerFeed.ingredients: Corn, soybean meal, wheat, vitamins, minerals
broilerFeed.usage: Feed from day 1 to day 7 to provide essential nutrients for healthy growth.

broilerFeed.name: Prestige Broiler Starter
broilerFeed.description: Nutritious feed for broiler chickens during the starter phase.
broilerFeed.ingredients: Corn, soybean meal, wheat, vitamins, minerals
broilerFeed.usage: Feed from day 8 to day 21 to support optimal growth and development.

broilerFeed.name: Prestige Broiler Grower
broilerFeed.description: Balanced feed for broilers during the grower phase.
broilerFeed.ingredients: Corn, soybean meal, wheat, vitamins, minerals
broilerFeed.usage: Feed from day 22 to day 35 to ensure proper weight gain and muscle development.

broilerFeed.name: Prestige Broiler Finisher
broilerFeed.description: Final phase feed for broilers during the finishing stage.
broilerFeed.ingredients: Corn, soybean meal, wheat, vitamins, minerals
broilerFeed.usage: Feed from day 36 until market weight to promote meat quality and overall health.
